sense.def:
One's limbs
so človekove roke in noge.

seg.quote: He was very tall with long limbs.
We cough, yawn, and stretch our limbs.

sense.def:
The limbs of a tree
so veje pri drevesu;

seg.quote: Thick smoke rose into the tree's upper limbs.

sense.def:
To go out on a limb
pomeni storiti ali reči nekaj tveganega ali skrajnega.

cit.quote: izpostaviti se, biti v kočljivem položaju

sense.def:
To risk life and limb
pomeni storiti nekaj zelo nevarnega.
